title: Kourend & Kebos Diary

properties.name: description
properties.value: For a list of every task sorted by certain requirements, see Achievement Diary/All achievements.

content:
For a list of every task sorted by certain requirements, see Achievement Diary/All achievements.

Kourend & Kebos Diary
Released 10 January 2019 (Update)
Area(s) Great Kourend, Kebos Lowlands
Members Yes
Item reward Blessing
Lamp XP rewards 2,500
7,500
15,000
50,000
Taskmaster(s) Elise
Levels required
Total level: 1086
 ----  ----  65
 ----  49  70
 40  12  82
 ----  49  84
 ----  30  50
 90  40  90
 77  95  85
 25  53
85 ----

The Kourend & Kebos Diary, also known as the Zeah Diary, is a set of achievement diaries whose tasks revolve around areas in Great Kourend as well as the Kebos Lowlands.

Elise's location

Several skill, quest and item requirements are needed to complete all tasks. Unless stated otherwise, temporary skill boosts can be used to meet the skill requirements.

Rewards can be claimed from Elise, south-east of the statue of King Rada I in the courtyard of the Kourend Castle. Note that the previous tiers of a diary must be completed to claim rewards of the next tier.

Certain tasks that can be tracked, such as finishing a raid in Chambers of Xeric, will be automatically marked as done if the player had had completed it before the diary was released.[1]

Contents

  • 1 Overview
  • 2 Easy
    • 2.1 Rewards
  • 3 Medium
    • 3.1 Rewards
  • 4 Hard
    • 4.1 Rewards
  • 5 Elite
    • 5.1 Rewards
  • 6 Changes
  • 7 References

Overview[edit | edit source]

The rewards can be claimed from Elise. She is located in the south-east corner of the Kourend Castle courtyard.

Skill Requirements[2][3]
15
12
20
25
25
 
115+
Quest Requirements
Druidic Ritual
Additional Requirements
15% Hosidius favour
  1. ^ Jagex. Mod Kieren's Twitter account. 2 January 2019. (Archived from the original on 29 May 2020.) Mod Kieren: "They will autocomplete!"
  2. ^ Some skills may be boostable, review the main section for more details.
  3. ^ In addition, some tasks of a lower tier may have higher requirements. Players must complete all the tasks of the previous tiers before they can claim the rewards for the current tier.

Rewards

  • Rada's blessing 1
    • 3 teleports to the Kourend Woodland every day
    • 2% chance to catch two fish at once everywhere when equipped (no additional experience)
  • Antique lamp worth 2,500 experience in any skill above 30
  • Halved access cost for Crabclaw Isle
  • Doubled drop rate of Xeric's talisman, excluding stone chests
  • Reduced tanning prices at Eodan in Forthos Dungeon from his default price to 80% of his default price.

Skill Requirements[1][2]
42
49
43
30

50

53
 
377+
Quest Requirements
The Ascent of Arceuus
The Depths of Despair
Eagles' Peak
The Forsaken Tower
The Queen of Thieves
Tale of the Righteous
Additional Requirements
40% Shayzien favour
60% Arceuus favour
60% Hosidius favour
Started Fairytale II - Cure a Queen
  1. ^ Some skills may be boostable, review the main section for more details.
  2. ^ In addition, some tasks of a lower tier may have higher requirements. Players must complete all the tasks of the previous tiers before they can claim the rewards for the current tier.

Rewards

  • Rada's blessing 2
    • 5 teleports to the Kourend Woodland every day
    • 4% chance to catch two fish at once everywhere when equipped (no additional experience)
    • +1 prayer bonus given by the blessing
  • Antique lamp worth 7,500 experience in any skill above 40
  • Free access to Crabclaw Isle
  • 5% chance to mine two Dense essence blocks at once
  • 20 free Dynamite a day from Thirus
  • Reduced tanning prices at Eodan in Forthos Dungeon from 80% of his default price to 60% of his default price.

Skill Requirements[1][2]

100% Shayzien favour
  1. ^ Some skills may be boostable, review the main section for more details.
  2. ^ In addition, some tasks of a lower tier may have higher requirements. Players must complete all the tasks of the previous tiers before they can claim the rewards for the current tier.

Rewards

  • Rada's blessing 3
    • Unlimited teleports to the Kourend Woodland
    • 3 teleports to Mount Karuulm every day
    • 6% chance to catch two fish at once everywhere when equipped (no additional experience)
  • Ash sanctifier
    • An additional item that, when carried, causes demonic ashes dropped from killed monsters to be automatically scattered, granting half the Prayer experience that would have been granted for scattering them normally; charged with death runes
    • It can be claimed from Tyss
  • Antique lamp worth 15,000 experience in any skill above 50
  • Slayer helmet will work as a Shayzien helm (5) after talking to Captain Cleive
  • 5% increased chance to save a harvest life at the Hosidius and Farming Guild herb patches
  • 40 free dynamite a day from Thirus
  • Reduced tanning prices at Eodan in Forthos Dungeon from 60% of his default price to 40% of his default price.

Skill Requirements[1][2]
38
82
84

732+
Quest Requirements
None
Additional Requirements
75% Hosidius favour
100% Arceuus favour
100% Port Piscarilius favour
Defeat Skotizo
  1. ^ Some skills may be boostable, review the main section for more details.
  2. ^ In addition, some tasks of a lower tier may have higher requirements. Players must complete all the tasks of the previous tiers before they can claim the rewards for the current tier.

Rewards

  • Rada's blessing 4
    • Unlimited teleports to Mount Karuulm
    • 8% chance to catch two fish at once everywhere when equipped (no additional experience)
    • An additional +1 prayer bonus given by the blessing (Total prayer bonus of +2)
  • Demonic ashes from the ash sanctifier grant full Prayer experience
  • Antique lamp worth 50,000 experience in any skill above 70
  • 20 Slayer points for completing Slayer tasks from Konar quo Maten (up from 18)
  • 10% reduced burn chance at the city kitchens (up from 5%)
  • 80 free dynamite a day from Thirus
  • Protection from the burn effect in the Karuulm Slayer Dungeon without boots of stone, boots of brimstone or granite boots
  • 10% additional blood runes from blood Runecrafting (no additional experience is given for the extra runes)
  • Reduced tanning prices at Eodan in Forthos Dungeon from 40% of his default price to 20% of his default price.

Easy[edit | edit source]

Items Required
  • Any pickaxe
  • A weapon
  • Spade
  • 8,750 coins
  • Shayzien medpack
  • Tarromin potion (unf)
  • Limpwurt root
  • Fly fishing rod
  • Feathers
Skills Needed
  • 25 Construction
  • 20 Fishing
  • 12 Herblore
  • 15 Mining
  • 25 Thieving
Quests/Favour required
  • 15% Hosidius favour
  • Druidic Ritual
Task Requirements
1. Mine some iron ore at the Mount Karuulm mine.
  • 15 Mining
  • Any pickaxe
2. Kill a Sand Crab. None
3. Hand in a book at the Arceuus Library. None
4. Steal from a Hosidius Fruit Stall.
  • 15% Hosidius favour
  • 25 Thieving
5. Browse the Warrens General Store. None
6. Take a boat to Land's End. None
7. Pray at the altar on the top floor of the Kourend Castle. None
8. Dig up some saltpetre (south-west of Hosidius).
  • Spade
9. Enter your player-owned house from Hosidius.
  • 25 Construction
  • 8,750 coins
10. Heal a wounded Shayzien soldier.
They are healed with a Shayzien medpack, found in boxes nearby. 		None
11. Create a strength potion in the Lovakengj pub.
  • Completion of Druidic Ritual
  • 12 Herblore
  • Tarromin potion (unf) and limpwurt root
12. Fish a Trout from the River Molch (south-east of the Farming Guild).
  • 20 Fishing
  • Fly fishing rod and some feathers

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • Rada's blessing 1
    • 3 teleports to the Kourend Woodland every day
    • 2% chance to catch two fish at once everywhere when equipped (no additional experience)
  • Antique lamp worth 2,500 experience in any skill above 30
  • Halved access cost for Crabclaw Isle
  • Doubled drop rate of Xeric's talisman, excluding stone chests
  • Reduced tanning prices at Eodan in Forthos Dungeon from his default price to 80% of his default price.

Medium[edit | edit source]

Items Required
  • Dramen or Lunar staff
  • Combat gear
  • Face mask, Gas mask or Slayer helmet
  • Kharedst's memoirs or the Book of the dead
  • Any pickaxe
  • Hammer
  • 30-100 Nails
  • 3 Planks
  • Intelligence
  • King worm or Fish chunks
  • Box trap
  • Any axe
Skills Needed
  • 49 Agility
  • 30 Crafting
  • 45 Farming
  • 50 Firemaking
  • 43 Fishing
  • 53 Hunter
  • 42 Mining
  • 50 Woodcutting
Quests/Favour required
  • 20% Lovakengj favour
  • 40% Shayzien favour
  • 60% Arceuus favour
  • 60% Hosidius favour
  • Eagles' Peak
  • The Depths of Despair
  • The Queen of Thieves
  • Tale of the Righteous
  • The Forsaken Tower
  • The Ascent of Arceuus
    • Client of Kourend
  • Started Fairytale II - Cure a Queen
    • Fairytale I - Growing Pains
      • Lost City
      • Nature Spirit
        • The Restless Ghost
        • Priest in Peril
Task Requirements
1. Travel to the fairy ring south of Mount Karuulm (CIR).
  • Started Fairytale II - Cure a Queen
  • Dramen or Lunar staff
2. Kill a lizardman.
  • Combat equipment and antipoison are recommended
3. Use Kharedst's memoirs to teleport to all five cities in Great Kourend.
  • Completion of The Depths of Despair, The Queen of Thieves, Tale of the Righteous, The Forsaken Tower and The Ascent of Arceuus
  • Kharedst's memoirs or the Book of the dead
4. Mine some volcanic sulphur.
  • 42 Mining
  • Any pickaxe
  • Face mask, gas mask or slayer helmet
5. Enter the Farming Guild (by walking through the main entrance).
  • 60% Hosidius favour
  • 45 Farming
6. Switch to the Arceuus spellbook via Tyss.
  • 60% Arceuus favour
7. Repair a crane within Port Piscarilius.
  • 30 Crafting
  • Hammer, about 50 nails and 3 regular planks
8. Deliver some intelligence to Captain Ginea.
  • 40% Shayzien favour
  • Combat equipment to obtain the intelligence
9. Catch a Bluegill on Lake Molch.
  • 43 Fishing and 35 Hunter
  • King worm (found in abundance on the island) or fish chunks
10. Use the boulder leap shortcut in the dense essence mine (north-east by the bright crystals).
  • 49 Agility
11. Subdue the Wintertodt (earn at least 500 points).
  • 50 Firemaking
  • Any axe, tinderbox, food and warm clothing
  • Recommended: Knife and hammer
12. Catch a chinchompa in the Kourend Woodland.
  • Completion of Eagles' Peak
  • 53 Hunter
  • Box trap
13. Chop some mahogany logs north of the Farming Guild.
  • 50 Woodcutting
  • Any axe

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • Rada's blessing 2
    • 5 teleports to the Kourend Woodland every day
    • 4% chance to catch two fish at once everywhere when equipped (no additional experience)
    • +1 prayer bonus given by the blessing
  • Antique lamp worth 7,500 experience in any skill above 40
  • Free access to Crabclaw Isle
  • 5% chance to mine two Dense essence blocks at once
  • 20 free Dynamite a day from Thirus
  • Reduced tanning prices at Eodan in Forthos Dungeon from 80% of his default price to 60% of his default price.

Hard[edit | edit source]

Items Required
  • Adamantite ore
  • 6 coal
  • Combat equipment
  • Boots of stone
  • Any pickaxe
  • Light source
  • Xeric's talisman
  • Lizardman fang
  • Lockpick
  • 1 1 1
  • Seed dibber
Skills Needed
  • 74 Farming
  • 66 Magic
  • 65 Mining
  • 62 Slayer
  • 70 Smithing
  • 49 Thieving
  • 60 Woodcutting
  • 85 Combat (Dream Mentor)
Quests/Favour required
  • 100% Hosidius favour
  • 100% Shayzien favour
  • 100% Port Piscarilius favour
  • 100% Lovakengj favour
  • 100% Arceuus favour
  • Architectural Alliance
  • Dream Mentor
    • Lunar Diplomacy
      • The Fremennik Trials
      • Lost City
      • Rune Mysteries
      • Shilo Village
        • Jungle Potion
          • Druidic Ritual
    • Eadgar's Ruse
      • Troll Stronghold
        • Death Plateau
Task Requirements
1. Enter the Woodcutting Guild.
  • 75% Hosidius favour
  • 60 Woodcutting
2. Smelt an adamantite bar in The Forsaken Tower.
  • Completion of The Forsaken Tower
  • 70 Smithing
  • Adamantite ore and 6 coal
3. Kill a lizardman shaman in the Lizardman Temple.
  • 100% Shayzien favour
  • Decent combat skills and equipment, and antipoison
4. Mine some Lovakite ore.
  • 30% Lovakengj favour
  • 65 Mining
  • Any pickaxe
5. Plant some Logavano seeds at the Tithe Farm.
  • 100% Hosidius favour
  • 74 Farming
  • Seed dibber, spade and a full watering can
6. Kill a zombie in the Shayzien Crypts.
  • Decent combat skills and equipment, and a light source
7. Teleport to Xeric's Heart using Xeric's talisman.
  • Completion of Architectural Alliance
  • Xeric's talisman and a lizardman fang, or a mounted xeric's talisman inside a player-owned house (another player's house may be used)
8. Deliver an artefact to Captain Khaled.
  • 75% Port Piscarilius favour
  • 49 Thieving
  • Lockpick
9. Kill a wyrm in the Karuulm Slayer Dungeon.
  • 62 Slayer
  • Weaponry, and boots of stone, brimstone or granite
10. Cast Monster Examine on a mountain troll south of Mount Quidamortem.
  • Completion of Dream Mentor
  • 66 Magic and means to cast Monster Examine ( 1 1 1 ) (Lunar Spellbook)

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • Rada's blessing 3
    • Unlimited teleports to the Kourend Woodland
    • 3 teleports to Mount Karuulm every day
    • 6% chance to catch two fish at once everywhere when equipped (no additional experience)
  • Ash sanctifier
    • An additional item that, when carried, causes demonic ashes dropped from killed monsters to be automatically scattered, granting half the Prayer experience that would have been granted for scattering them normally; charged with death runes
    • It can be claimed from Tyss
  • Antique lamp worth 15,000 experience in any skill above 50
  • Slayer helmet will work as a Shayzien helm (5) after talking to Captain Cleive
  • 5% increased chance to save a harvest life at the Hosidius and Farming Guild herb patches
  • 40 free dynamite a day from Thirus
  • Reduced tanning prices at Eodan in Forthos Dungeon from 60% of his default price to 40% of his default price.

Elite[edit | edit source]

Items Required
  • Any pickaxe
  • Chisel
  • Any axe
  • Dark totem
  • Dense essence block
  • 2 2 2
  • Fishing rod
  • Sandworms
  • Combat equipment
  • Celastrus sapling
Skills Needed
  • High Combat level
  • 84 Cooking
  • 38 Crafting
  • 85 Farming
  • 82 Fishing
  • 40 Fletching
  • 90 Magic
  • 38 Mining
  • 77 Runecraft
  • 95 Slayer
  • 90 Woodcutting
Quests/Favour required
  • 75% Hosidius favour
  • 100% Arceuus favour
  • 100% Port Piscarilius favour
Task Requirements
1. Craft one or more blood runes from essence. (Must be crafted at Kourend's Blood Altar, cannot be the Ourania altar)
  • 100% Arceuus favour
  • 77 Runecraft, 38 Mining and 38 Crafting
  • Any pickaxe and chisel
2. Chop some redwood logs.
  • 75% Hosidius favour
  • 90 Woodcutting
  • Any axe
3. Defeat Skotizo in the Catacombs of Kourend.
  • Decent combat skills and equipment, and a dark totem
4. Catch an anglerfish and cook it whilst in Great Kourend.
  • 100% Port Piscarilius favour
  • 82 Fishing and 84 Cooking
  • Fishing rod and some sandworms
5. Kill a hydra in the Karuulm Slayer Dungeon.
  • 95 Slayer
  • Decent combat skills and equipment
6. Create an Ape Atoll teleport tablet.
  • 100% Arceuus favour
  • 90 Magic
  • Dark essence block and the required runes ( 2 2 2 ) with the Arceuus spellbook active
7. Complete a raid in the Chambers of Xeric.
  • Decent combat skills and equipment
  • Can use a raid group to complete at low combat.
8. Create your own battlestaff from scratch within the Farming Guild.
  • 60% Hosidius favour
  • 85 Farming and 40 Fletching
  • Celastrus sapling, knife and any axe
  • Recommended: 8 potato cacti to protect your crop

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • Rada's blessing 4
    • Unlimited teleports to Mount Karuulm
    • 8% chance to catch two fish at once everywhere when equipped (no additional experience)
    • An additional +1 prayer bonus given by the blessing (Total prayer bonus of +2)
  • Demonic ashes from the ash sanctifier grant full Prayer experience
  • Antique lamp worth 50,000 experience in any skill above 70
  • 20 Slayer points for completing Slayer tasks from Konar quo Maten (up from 18)
  • 10% reduced burn chance at the city kitchens (up from 5%)
  • 80 free dynamite a day from Thirus
  • Protection from the burn effect in the Karuulm Slayer Dungeon without boots of stone, boots of brimstone or granite boots
  • 10% additional blood runes from blood Runecrafting at the Zeah blood altar (no additional experience is given for the extra runes)
  • Reduced tanning prices at Eodan in Forthos Dungeon from 40% of his default price to 20% of his default price.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
14 April 2021
(update)

All diary tasks to craft runes were changed to clarify they only can be completed with essence.

4 July 2019
(update | poll)

Addition of Eodan tanning price reduction benefit.

Hand in a book at the [[Arceuus Library]]. |{{NA|None}} |- |4. Steal from a [[Fruit Stall|Hosidius Fruit Stall]]. | *[[File:Kourend task icon.png]] 15% [[Hosidius]] [[favour]] *{{SCP|Thieving|25|link=y}} |- |5. Browse the [[Warrens General Store]]. |{{NA|None}} |- |6. Take a boat to [[Land's End]]. |{{NA|None}} |- |7. Pray at the altar on the top floor of the [[Kourend Castle]]. |{{NA|None}} |- |8. Dig up some [[saltpetre]] (south-west of [[Hosidius]]). | *[[Spade]] |- |9. Enter your [[player-owned house]] from [[Hosidius]]. | *{{SCP|Construction|25|link=y}} *8,750 [[coins]] |- |10. Heal a [[wounded Shayzien soldier]].
''They are healed with a [[Shayzien medpack]], found in boxes nearby.'' |{{NA|None}} |- |11. Create a [[strength potion]] in the [[The Deeper Lode|Lovakengj pub]]. | *{{SCP|Quest}}Completion of [[Druidic Ritual]] *{{SCP|Herblore|12|link=y}} *[[Tarromin potion (unf)]] and [[limpwurt root]] |- |12. Fish a [[Raw trout|Trout]] from the [[River Molch]] (south-east of the [[Farming Guild]]). | *{{SCP|Fishing|20|link=y}} *[[Fly fishing rod]] and some [[feather]]s |- |} ===Rewards=== *[[Rada's blessing 1]] **3 teleports to the [[Kourend Woodland]] every day **2% chance to catch two fish at once everywhere when equipped (no additional experience) *[[Antique lamp]] worth 2,500 experience in any skill above 30 *Halved access cost for [[Crabclaw Isle]] *Doubled drop rate of [[Xeric's talisman]], excluding [[stone chest]]s *Reduced tanning prices at [[Eodan]] in [[Forthos Dungeon]] from his default price to 80% of his default price. ==Medium== {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! Travel to the [[fairy ring]] south of [[Mount Karuulm]] ({{Fairycode|CIR}}). | *{{SCP|Quest}} Started [[Fairytale II - Cure a Queen]] *[[Dramen staff|Dramen]] or [[Lunar staff]] |- |2. Catch a [[Bluegill]] on [[Lake Molch]]. | *{{SCP|Fishing|43|link=y}} and {{SCP|Hunter|35|link=y}} *[[King worm]] (found in abundance on the island) or [[fish chunks]] |- |10. Use the [[Boulder (dense essence mine)|boulder]] leap [[shortcut]] in the [[dense essence mine]] (north-east by the bright crystals). | *{{SCP|Agility|49|link=y}} |- |11. Subdue the [[Wintertodt]] (earn at least 500 points). | *{{SCP|Firemaking|50|link=y}} *Any [[axe]], [[tinderbox]], [[food]] and [[warm clothing]] *'''''Recommended:''' [[Knife]] and [[hammer]] |- |12. Catch a [[Chinchompa (Hunter)|chinchompa]] in the [[Kourend Woodland]]. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[Eagles' Peak]] *{{SCP|Hunter|53|link=y}} *[[Box trap]] |- |13. Chop some [[mahogany logs]] north of the [[Farming Guild]]. | *{{SCP|Woodcutting|50|link=y}} *Any [[axe]] |} === Rewards === *[[Rada's blessing 2]] **5 teleports to the [[Kourend Woodland]] every day **4% chance to catch two fish at once everywhere when equipped (no additional experience) **+1 prayer bonus given by the blessing *[[Antique lamp]] worth 7,500 experience in any skill above 40 *Free access to [[Crabclaw Isle]] *5% chance to mine two [[Dense essence block]]s at once *20 free [[Dynamite]] a day from [[Thirus]] *Reduced tanning prices at [[Eodan]] in [[Forthos Dungeon]] from 80% of his default price to 60% of his default price. ==Hard== {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" !
